mapper.select: SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_pwd, emp_address, emp_rrnum, emp_phone, emp_salary, emp_hiredate, emp_div, emp_retiredate FROM tb_employee where emp_id = #{empId} and emp_pwd= #{empPwd}
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_pwd, emp_address, emp_rrnum, emp_phone, emp_salary, emp_hiredate, emp_div, emp_retiredate FROM tb_employee
